alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 7:38PM PDT until October 15 at 8:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central San Bernardino County in southern California... * Until 845 PM PDT. * At 737 PM PDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles northeast of Owl Canyon Campground to 8 miles southwest of Newberry Springs, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs and trees. * Locations impacted include... Barstow, Daggett, I-15 Between Victorville And Barstow, Owl Canyon Campground, Hwy 247 Between Lucerne Valley And Barstow, Lenwood and Nebo Center. This includes the following roads... Interstate 15 in California between mile markers 81 and 90. Interstate 40 in California between mile markers 1 and 17. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
